settings.text:
THE WORLDS BEST COFFEES ON REPEAT
We are sending out the most amazing Single Origin Coffees every day.
Simply pick your style: From rotating Microlots to Masterpiece Coffees.

OUR PLEDGE TO QUALITY
We will never lower our qualities - even with the sharp increase of coffee prices, transportation costs and a 15% decline of the Euro against the US Dollar. That said, we had to increase slightly our subscription pricing. We know that you appreciate our delicious coffees. You can trust us to deliver total quality!

NEWS: We are working on new eco-price shipment for our European Customers!

Ralf Rueller, Founder

settings.name: lowcaf
settings.title:
LOW CAFFEINE
COFFEE
settings.shortDescription: Beans with naturally low caffeine levels.
settings.longDescription:
We offer two coffee varietals that contain less than half of the caffeine you typically find in coffee. These rare beans are grown in nature. Each month you will receive two 250g bags of naturally low caffeine beans.

In {{ "now" | date: "%B"| prepend: " " }} we are sending out :
{{settings.low_caf}}

settings.name: Masterpiece
settings.description: Our most exclusive subscription. The rarest coffee beans with unique traits and flavours. We carefully select and ship a different coffee every month.

settings.name: House Subscription
settings.description: Our House Filter or Espresso. Single Origin Coffee with a consistent profile for you to enjoy all day at your house. Our best offer for customers in Germany

settings.name: USA & CANADA
settings.description: Our most popular subscriptions are now tailormade for North America: Cheaper & Faster. We ship fresh from our warehouse in the USA. Like a local.
